meta.title: Oil Tank Truck inspection
meta.description: Oil Tank Truck need to be periodically inspected follow regulation of Department of Energy Business, TheMinistry of Energy of the Kingdom of Thailand.

content1.title: What does our Oil Tank Truck inspection do ?

subtitle.text: The moving of fuel oil from one location to another either by land, water, pipeline or other means.
Oil Tank Truck need to be periodically inspected follow regulation of Department of Energy Business, TheMinistry of Energy of the Kingdom of Thailand.

content2.title: Oil Tank Truck Inspection By Laws
content2.subtitle1: Regulation of Department of Energy Business, The Ministry of Energy of the Kingdom of Thailand following

content3.title: Annual Inspection
content3.subtitle2: Visual Inspection at Tank shell, Fuel pipe system and external welding

subtitle2.text: Visual Inspection at Tank shell, Fuel pipe system and external welding
Leak testing on shell, pipe system, safety system and Ventilation.
Leak testing will be used inert gas or hydrostatic testing
